mapper.select: SELECT eventNum, eventTitle, eventContent, eventCreateTime, eventImageName, eventImageUrl, userNum, eventTempSave FROM event ORDER BY eventCreateTime DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT eventNum, eventTitle, eventContent, eventCreateTime, eventImageName, eventImageUrl, userNum, eventTempSave FROM event WHERE eventNum = #{eventNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event (eventTitle, eventContent, eventCreateTime, eventImageName, eventImageUrl, userNum, eventTempSave) VALUES (#{eventTitle}, #{eventContent}, NOW(), #{eventImageName}, #{eventImageUrl}, #{userNum}, #{eventTempSave})
mapper.update: UPDATE event SET eventTitle = #{eventTitle}, eventContent = #{eventContent}, eventImageName = #{eventImageName}, eventImageUrl = #{eventImageUrl}, eventTempSave = #{eventTempSave} WHERE eventNum = #{eventNum}
